vote.title: An ordinance abandoning a portion of an alley to PPA Realty, Ltd., the abutting owner, containing approximately 3,597 square feet of land, located near the intersection of Lemmon and Dorothy Avenues; and authorizing the quitclaim and providing for the dedication of approximately 2,663 square feet of land needed for street purposes - Revenue: General Capital Reserve Fund ($23,665.00) and General Fund ($20,000.00), plus the $20.00 ordinance publication fee
vote.description: An ordinance abandoning a portion of an alley to PPA Realty, Ltd., the abutting owner, containing approximately 3,597 square feet of land, located near the intersection of Lemmon and Dorothy Avenues; and authorizing the quitclaim and providing for the dedication of approximately 2,663 square feet of land needed for street purposes - Revenue: General Capital Reserve Fund ($23,665.00) and General Fund ($20,000.00), plus the $20.00 ordinance publication fee
